message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair starting point, and we can adjust in the next round if you'd like.
I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split. The money is worth the same to me, but 5% less to you now.
Let's split it evenly this time. Inflation is hurting me, but I think a fair 50/50 split is the best way to end this.
Considering the inflation, I think I deserve a bit more. This is my new proposal.
